  physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a fort at Kangra
 in Punjab
 India. The photograph shows a steep hill on the right
 with a fort at the top of the hill. There are some water bodies along the valley on the left of the photograph. The fort is surrounded by thick vegetation. The photograph looks faded. The top two corners are rounded. There is a scratch at the bottom-left. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

There are some water bodies along the valley on the left of the photograph. The fort is surrounded by thick vegetation. The photograph looks faded. The top two corners are rounded. There is a scratch at the bottom-left. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
